vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
B.go (patch_3.sol#10-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(address(this).balance) (patch_3.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in B.go (patch_3.sol#10-14):
	-require(bool,string)(target.call.value(msg.value)(),Low level call failed) patch_3.sol#12
